scripts.video:mp4: node scripts/encode-video.mjs --format mp4 --input src/assets/img/hero/splash.mov --outdir src/assets/img/hero --name splash --height 1080 --fps 24
scripts.video:webm: node scripts/encode-video.mjs --format webm --input src/assets/img/hero/splash.mov --outdir src/assets/img/hero --name splash --height 1080 --fps 24
